attributes.action: involve experienced business men and women in the running of government departments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many important decisions in the NHS,Home Office,Education etc.are left in the hands of politicians,who,in many cases,lack the experience or ability to manage such projects,involving huge sums of Public funds-viz.Minister X runs the Foreign Office and then takes over the NHS etc.These massive Organisations should be run by,or at least in conjunction with,proven,experienced and succesful achievers in Business and other walks of life

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
